name: Happy Water Draw Line
description:
This is a new Arcade game created by Young Stars, the creator of "16 Squares" and "Jelly Blaster Legend" games!

Your job is to draw a line to make the glass filled up with liquid and smile again!

Try to find the best way to complete each level. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and don't be afraid to think out of the box!
Some levels might look easy but let's see if you can actually get the 3 stars.

How to play:

Using your brush to draw or pouring something, when the wine barrel start pouring, the beer will follow drawn lines and fall into the glass. Your mission is to help beer falling into the glass as much as possible, the mission is failing when beer falls out so much.

Have the hint tool to help you draw right way to complete the mission, but recommend for you is thinking first, it will help your brainstorm growing to ready for many next missions, many challenging levels are waiting for you ahead.

FEATURES:
* Dynamic mechanism. Draw lines freely to complete levels!
* Simple, smart and fun puzzles but can be challenging too
* Lots of levels with more coming soon!
* Fun and relaxing theme that will make you stay for quite some time

****************************************************************************************
Download Happy Water Draw Line now to start your saga! Enjoy!
***************************************************************************
